name: Frenzy Medical
description:
Frenzy Medical is an ER doctor simulator game prototype inspired by Overcooked. 

Treat your patients and generate enough revenue to satisfy the increasing demands of the hospital's shareholders. How long can you keep your job?

Frenzy Medical was made for Mini Jam 128, but I missed the submission deadline. Oops.

Frenzy Medical is game #2 of my 12 games in 12 months challenge. A detailed Devlog will be available very soon on my Youtube channel.

Controls: Keyboard or Xbox controller

  • Move: Keyboard WASD or arrows, Xbox D-pad or left-stick
  • Interact: Keyboard E, Xbox A
  • Pause: Keyboard Space, Xbox Start
  • Restart (while the game is paused): Keyboard R, Xbox Y

Feedback much appreciated. Thank you!

Assets used:

  • Kenney's Onscreen Controls
  • Elevator Music by Dar Golan

Disclaimer:

The guidance and information provided in this game, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, and other materials, are intended for entertainment purposes only. None of the information presented in this game should be considered a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. It is crucial to consult with a qualified healthcare provider or physician for any inquiries related to medical conditions, treatment options, or before starting a new healthcare routine. Always seek expert medical advice and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have experienced or read within the game.
